dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, have you seen the news from the recent Social Responsibility Forum in Saudi Arabia? It sounds pretty big.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, have you seen the news from the recent Social Responsibility Forum in Saudi Arabia? It sounds pretty big.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the opening of the Forum, Saudi Minister of Human Resources and Social Development, Ahmad Al-Rajhi highlighted Saudi Arabias vision to establish a world-class platform for social responsibility dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, totally! Ahmad Al-Rajhi, the Finance Minister, he really laid out this vision for, like, a world-class platform for SR dialogue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, totally! Ahmad Al-Rajhi, the Finance Minister, he really laid out this vision for, like, a world-class platform for S R dialogue.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the opening of the Forum, Saudi Minister of Human Resources and Social Development, Ahmad Al-Rajhi highlighted Saudi Arabias vision to establish a world-class platform for social responsibility dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And he's pushing for global partnerships, public-private collaboration in sustainable development. I mean, it's not just talk, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And he's pushing for global partnerships, public-private collaboration in sustainable development. I mean, it's not just talk, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This forum aims to foster global partnerships and create new models for public-private collaboration in sustainable development, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He even talked about how CSR has evolved. It's not just about, like, charity anymore. It's innovation, sustainable digitization, integrating tech, recycling...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He even talked about how C S R has evolved. It's not just about, like, charity anymore. It's innovation, sustainable digitization, integrating tech, recycling...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Al-Rajhi outlined the evolution of corporate social responsibility, emphasizing its increasing focus on innovation, sustainable digitization, and strategic transformation. He underlined the growing trend of companies integrating technology, recycling, and circular economy principles into their daily operations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, and renewable energy, human development. It's all about, um, a more balanced community growth now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and renewable energy, human development. It's all about, um, a more balanced community growth now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This shift includes renewable energy to drive environmental sustainability, human development, and balanced community growth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is huge. And he called Saudi Arabia's progress an "inspiring story of transformation." Like, they're really embedding it as a strategic goal in Vision 2040.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is huge. And he called Saudi Arabia's progress an inspiring story of transformation. Like, they're really embedding it as a strategic goal in Vision twenty forty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Minister hailed Saudi Arabia's progress in social responsibility as an inspiring story of transformation and empowerment, emphasizing the Kingdom's dedication to embedding it as a strategic goal within Saudi Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They've done a ton, too! A dedicated committee, a national strategy, a platform for transparency... even Social Responsibility Day on April 23rd!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've done a ton, too! A dedicated committee, a national strategy, a platform for transparency... even Social Responsibility Day on April twenty third!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Furthermore, the Kingdom has declared March 23rd as Social Responsibility Day to showcase private sector efforts issued guidance for companies, developed a social responsibility index for the Saudi market, and fostered a shared national identity for social responsibility.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And the numbers! Corporate social spending jumped from 2.19% to over 3% by 2023. And big companies with CSR programs went from 35% to 60%! That's, uh, significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the numbers! Corporate social spending jumped from two point one nine percent to over three percent by twenty twenty three. And big companies with C S R programs went from thirty five percent to sixty percent! That's, uh, significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These contributions to social spending jumped from 1.19% in 2019 to 4.15% by the end of 2023, while the percentage of large companies with CSR programs jumped from 30% to 65% during the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And it shows in their global ranking â€“ up to 20th in the IMD World Competitiveness Yearbook, from 41st in 2021. He's confident they'll be top by 2030.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it shows in their global ranking - up to twentieth in the I M D World Competitiveness Yearbook, from forty first in twenty twenty one. He's confident they'll be top by twenty thirty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This progress is reflected in Saudi Arabia's improved global ranking, climbing to 16th place in the IMD World Competitiveness Yearbook 2024's Social Responsibility Index, up from 41st in 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's some serious ambition. I mean, it's not just the Minister either, right? Other industry leaders were there too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's some serious ambition. I mean, it's not just the Minister either, right? Other industry leaders were there too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Minister was just one of an illustrious selection of speakers at the two-day forum, themed From Commitment to Impact, which was organized by the Saudi Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development. There, industry leaders gathered to discuss the evolving landscape of corporate social responsibility and its global impact, discuss challenges and explore opportunities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Rola Abu Maneah from Citibank, she stressed voluntary ESG reports for transparency. And, like, investors are really looking at sustainable products now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Rola Abu Maneah from Citibank, she stressed voluntary E S G reports for transparency. And, like, investors are really looking at sustainable products now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rola Abu Maneah, CEO of Standard Chartered Bank for the Middle East, agreed on the importance of the private sector to CSR: Voluntary Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) reports play a vital role in enhancing transparency and increasing investor awareness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Brendan Nelson from Airbus, I remember him saying how crucial well-planned strategies are, but also, you know, respecting local cultures. That's a good point.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Brendan Nelson from Airbus, I remember him saying how crucial well-planned strategies are, but also, you know, respecting local cultures. That's a good point.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking of the importance of strategy and respect, Brendan Nelson, President of Boeing Global said: Investing in social responsibility requires well-planned corporate strategies that help achieve objectives and address challenges. Maintaining company values and standards while respecting the cultures and regulations of host countries is equally essential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And HSBC's CEO, Faris Al-Ghannam, shared how they're nurturing Saudi talent, promoting regenerative agriculture. Super interesting stuff for food and water security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And H S B C's C E O, Faris Al-Ghannam, shared how they're nurturing Saudi talent, promoting regenerative agriculture. Super interesting stuff for food and water security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At HSBC Saudi Arabia, CEO Faris Al-Ghannam saw his organization as an example of the progress the Kingdom has achieved: We are dedicated to nurturing Saudi talent and have introduced a competition to promote regenerative agriculture in partnership with a non-profit organization. We invite entrepreneurs to contribute innovative ideas focused on food and water security, aligning with the regions key priorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development is really driving this. It's about excellence, partnerships, and international collaboration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development is really driving this. It's about excellence, partnerships, and international collaboration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Via the Global CSR Forum, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development aims to promote excellence and competitiveness, encourage partnerships across sectors, and pave the way for international collaboration in CSR.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it feels like they're really, uh, making a statement on the global stage. It's exciting to see this kind of focus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it feels like they're really, uh, making a statement on the global stage. It's exciting to see this kind of focus.
